article_title: Reckoning The Costs Of Federal Tax Compliance

article_metadata.description: The hardest thing in the world to understand is income taxes. —Albert Einstein I remarked in Part 2 of this 2014 Paperwork and Red Tape Roundup series (consider this Part 3) that 2013’s 9.5 billion hours of federal paperwork burdens took up the equivalent of 13,488 human lifetimes. The dollar cost of the federal tax [...]
article_metadata.author: Clyde Wayne Crews Jr.
